actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for equality of treatment with respect to married women Federal employees in connection with compensation for work injuries, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for equality of treatment with respect to married women Federal employees in connection with compensation for work injuries. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8101(11), 8110(a)(2))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for equality of treatment with respect to married women Federal employees in connection with compensation for work injuries, and for other purposes.
